TopicTitle: How to have more than 5 videos in one post?

Articles.Content:
I'm running the stock craft repository, and I'd like to be able to have more than five videos in my original post. Many members like posting videos for their crafts, and I wish I could include them, but I've hit my limit. Is it possible for the craft repository to receive an exception?

Note that all videos are concealed in spoilers to save space.
There's no way to avoid the limit. Loading videos into posts can slow down the page generation significantly, and adding more videos definitely does so. That's why the limit exists

Hmm, OK... that's unfortunate. I guess I'll make do. Thanks for the answer.
